implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Defines the REST API endpoint for creating a new task. Receives TaskCreate input and delegates creation to the TaskService.
implementation.name: POST /tasks
implementation.pseudo_code:
On POST /tasks with TaskCreate payload:
    Try to create task using TaskService
    If successful, return created Task
    If error, raise HTTP 400 with error message

implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Implements business logic for creating a task. Logs the operation and delegates to TaskRepository for persistence.
implementation.name: TaskService.create_task
implementation.pseudo_code:
Function create_task(task_data):
    Log creation attempt
    Call repository.add_task(task_data)
    Return created Task

implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Handles persistence of the new task. Assigns an ID, saves to file, and returns the Task object.
implementation.name: TaskRepository.add_task
implementation.pseudo_code:
Function add_task(task_data):
    Create Task object with new ID
    Append to task list
    Increment ID counter
    Save tasks to file
    Log creation
    Return Task
